Title: Relates to prohibiting the acquisition or transfer of agricultural land by foreign adversaries
Summary: Relates to prohibiting the acquisition or transfer of agricultural land by foreign adversaries after January 1, 2026; provides that such prohibition will not apply to any interest in agricultural land held by a foreign adversary prior to such date or any federally recognized Indian tribe or its government units and enterprises; defines terms.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to prohibiting the acquisition or transfer of agricultural land by foreign adversaries
